sentences.sContent: He acts as a middleman for British companies seeking contracts in the Gulf.
sentences.sCn: 他给在海湾地区寻找商机的英国公司当中间人。

sentences.sContent: Buy direct from the manufacturer and cut out the middleman (= avoid using a middleman ) .
sentences.sCn: 从厂家直接进货，绕开中间商。

trans.tranCn: 中间人， 中间商， 经纪人
trans.tranOther: someone who buys things in order to sell them to someone else, or who helps to arrange business deals for other people
